sentences.en: Alison cleverly deduced that I was the author of the letter.
sentences.cn: 艾莉森聪明地推断出我是这封信的作者。

sentences.en: Beyond the obviousfacts, I can deduce nothing else.
sentences.cn: 除了这些显而易见的情况以外, 我推断不出别的什么.

sentences.en: Can we deduce from your silence that you do not approve?
sentences.cn: 你保持沉默，我们是否可以据此而推断出你不赞成？

sentences.en: Can you deduce other structure formations based on the peptide bond structure?
sentences.cn: 你可以推论其它结构的形成是基于胜肽键结构 吗 ?

sentences.en: From the molecular formula alone , we can deduce the " degrees of unsaturation " in the molecule.
sentences.cn: 仅从分子式, 我们就能推断分子中的 “ 不饱和度 ”.

sentences.en: He expected to deduce new ones by mathematical means.
sentences.cn: 他期望用数学方法得出一些推论.

sentences.en: Here we will deduce the general equations of dynamics using generalized coordinates.
sentences.cn: 下面推导以广义坐标表示的动力学普遍方程的形式.

sentences.en: I imagine that you may deduce an apt moral from my tale.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你也许能从我的际遇中引出恰当的教训.

sentences.en: Let us deduce a life with the movie of colorful.
sentences.cn: 让我们用电影来演绎生活多彩.

sentences.en: Many experts deduce that there are aliens in other planets.
sentences.cn: 许多专家都推断在其他的星球上存在着太空人.

sentences.en: One can only deduce that the military are watching the situation.
sentences.cn: 我们只能推断,军队正在观望事态发展.

sentences.en: The police were able to deduce where the fugitive was hiding.
sentences.cn: 警方成功地推断出那逃亡者躲藏的地方.

sentences.en: The reason for the British bias towards airships at this stage is not hard to deduce.
sentences.cn: 弄清英国人在这个阶段如此热衷于建造飞艇的原因并不难.

sentences.en: We can deduce a conclusion from the premise.
sentences.cn: 我们可以从这个前提推出结论.

sentences.en: We will now deduce the properties of a single element.
sentences.cn: 现在我们推导单个无素的性质.

sentences.en: What do you deduce from these facts?
sentences.cn: 从这些事实你能推断出什么?

trans.tran_en: to use the knowledge and information you have in order to understand something or form an opinion about it

trans.tran_cn: 推论， 推断， 演绎
trans.tran_en: to use the knowledge and information you have in order to understand something or form an opinion about it
